description.value:
As a Spellmaster, you are adept at identifying magic. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus when you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Identify Magic] with a skill in which you are trained or better. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Wayfinder Resonance Tinkerer] feat, you can change the cantrip you chose for that feat each day during your daily preparations.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.O7fKfFxCx3e1YasX]{Spellmaster} archetype.

value.value: member of the Pathfinder Society affiliated with the School of Spells
